mapper.select: select procurement_id, employee_id, business_type, procurement_date, document, purchase_type, vendor, department, clerk_name, currency, exchange_rate, tax_rate, payment_terms, remark, invoice_number, procurement_creater, procurement_reviewer, procurement_changer, procurement_approver, now_number, procurement_state, create_date from accessories_procurement where procurement_id = #{procurementId}
mapper.insert: insert into accessories_procurement(employee_id, business_type, procurement_date, document, purchase_type, vendor, department, clerk_name, currency, exchange_rate, tax_rate, payment_terms, remark, invoice_number, procurement_creater, procurement_reviewer, procurement_changer, procurement_approver, now_number, procurement_state, create_date) values (#{employeeId}, #{businessType}, #{procurementDate}, #{document}, #{purchaseType}, #{vendor}, #{department}, #{clerkName}, #{currency}, #{exchangeRate}, #{taxRate}, #{paymentTerms}, #{remark}, #{invoiceNumber}, #{procurementCreater}, #{procurementReviewer}, #{procurementChanger}, #{procurementApprover}, #{nowNumber}, #{procurementState}, #{createDate})

update accessories_procurement
employee_id = #{employeeId},
business_type = #{businessType},

where procurement_id = #{procurementId}
